from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from delta.tables import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import max

dfNewFile = spark.read.format("parquet").load(sourcefile)
#nel file sono presenti duplicati per internalistitutionid con stato diverso e diversa data di creazione
#applico un filtro per prendere solo l'attivo più recente

#print(dtTmp.count())
dfTmp = dfNewFile.filter("state = 'ACTIVE'")

#print(dtTmp.count())
dfAgg = dfTmp.groupBy("internalistitutionid", "product").agg(max("updatedat").alias("max_date"))

dfTmp = dfTmp.join(dfAgg,(dfTmp["internalistitutionid"]==dfAgg["internalistitutionid"]) & (dfTmp["createdat"]== dfAgg["max_date"]) & (dfTmp["product"] == dfAgg["product"]))
dfTmp = dfTmp.drop(dfAgg["internalistitutionid"]).drop(dfAgg["max_date"]).drop(dfAgg["product"])
#print(dtTmp.count())


dfEnti = dfTmp.select("internalistitutionid","institution.institutionType","institution.description", "institution.digitalAddress", "institution.address", "institution.originId", "institution.zipCode", "institution.istatCode", "institution.city", "institution.country", "institution.county", "institution.subUnitCode", "institution.subUnitType", "institution.paymentServiceProvider", "billing.vatnumber", "billing.publicservices")
dfContratti = dfTmp.select("internalistitutionid", "product", "filename", "onboardingtokenid", "pricingplan", "updatedat", "createdat", "closedat", "year", "month", "daily")

actualTimeStamp = F.current_timestamp()
dfEnti = dfEnti.withColumn("LastModified", actualTimeStamp)
dfContratti = dfContratti.withColumn("LastModified", actualTimeStamp)

mergedDfEnti = tDeltaEnti.alias("target").merge(
    dfEnti.alias("source"),
    "target.internalistitutionid = source.internalistitutionid"
).whenMatchedUpdateAll().whenNotMatchedInsertAll().execute()

mergedDfContratti = tDeltaContratti.alias("target").merge(
    dfContratti.alias("source"),
    "target.internalistitutionid = source.internalistitutionid AND target.product = source.product"
).whenMatchedUpdateAll().whenNotMatchedInsertAll().execute()

watermarkTable =  DeltaTable.forName(spark, "fat_delta.watermark")

watermarkTable.update("TableName = 'enti'", {"LastModified": actualTimeStamp})
watermarkTable.update("TableName = 'contratti'", {"LastModified": actualTimeStamp})

# Get adls account name
raw_adls_container_name = mssparkutils.credentials.getFullConnectionString(linked_service_name)
print(raw_adls_container_name)

# Set configuration (SAS Token)
adls_sas_token = mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds(linked_service_name)
spark.conf.set('fs.azure.sas.%s.%s' % (container_name, adls_account_name), adls_sas_token)
print(adls_sas_token)
spark.sql(f"""CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS fat_delta""")

# device
spark.sql('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS  fat_delta.test')
spark.sql(
    f"""
    CREATE TABLE fat_delta.test  
    (
          ID string
        , Code string
        , Value double
        , CreatedOn timestamp                        
    ) USING DELTA
    LOCATION 'test'
    TBLPROPERTIES (
            'delta.logRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days', 
            'delta.deletedFileRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days');
    """
)

# Creazione tabella watermark
spark.sql('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS  fat_delta.watermark')
spark.sql(
    f"""
    CREATE TABLE fat_delta.watermark  
    (
          TableName string
        , LastModified timestamp                        
    ) USING DELTA
    LOCATION 'watermark'
    TBLPROPERTIES (
            'delta.logRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days', 
            'delta.deletedFileRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days');
    """

# Creazione tabella Enti
spark.sql('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS  fat_delta.enti')
spark.sql(
    f"""
    CREATE TABLE fat_delta.enti  
    (
          InternalIstitutionId string
        , institutionType string
        , description string
        , digitalAddress string
        , address string
        , originId string
        , zipCode string
        , istatCode string
        , city string
        , country string
        , county string
        , subUnitCode string
        , subUnitType string
        , paymentServiceProvider string
        , vatnumber string
        , publicservices string
        , LastModified timestamp                        
    ) USING DELTA
    LOCATION 'enti'
    TBLPROPERTIES (
            'delta.logRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days', 
            'delta.deletedFileRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days');
    """

# Creazione tabella Contratti
spark.sql('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS  fat_delta.contratti')
spark.sql(
    f"""
    CREATE TABLE fat_delta.contratti  
    (
          internalistitutionid string
        , product string
        , filename string
        , onboardingtokenid string
        , pricingplan string
        , updatedat string
        , createdat timestamp
        , closedat timestamp
        , year int
        , month int
        , daily string
        , LastModified timestamp                        
    ) USING DELTA
    LOCATION 'contratti'
    TBLPROPERTIES (
            'delta.logRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days', 
            'delta.deletedFileRetentionDuration'='interval 7 days');
    """

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

actualTimeStamp = F.current_timestamp()
data = [("contratti",  actualTimeStamp), ("enti", actualTimeStamp)]
df = spark.createDataFrame(data, ["TableName","TimeStamp"])
df.write.format("delta").mode("append").insertInto("fat_delta.watermark")

spark.sql(
    f"""
        INSERT INTO fat_delta.watermark (TableName, LastModified) 
        VALUES 
        ("contratti",null),
        ("enti",null)
    """
